item.title: Resources
item.description: Meditations The following are guided meditations, narrated by me. May they be of benefit to you. Brief Self-Compassion: this short meditation is intended to instill a sense of self-compassion by relating to yourself as you would to a good friend. This meditation is adapted from the work of Kristen Neff, PhD. Soften, Soothe, Allow: this is a meditation for dealing with difficult emotions.This meditation is adapted from the work of Kristen Neff, PhD.

item.title: Areas of Expertise
item.description: While some people seek treatment for specific mental health conditions, it is not necessary to know or even meet criteria for a mental health diagnosis in order to benefit from therapy. I recognize that therapy is a very personal process and you are a complex human being. While I have the expertise to assess symptoms and provide appropriate diagnoses, I also go above and beyond to treat each client as an individual.

item.title: About Dr. Lazarovich
item.description: Dr. Regina Lazarovich, Ph.D. Licensed Clinical Psychologist in California (PSY…) and New York (020676) I know that entering therapy can feel scary and vulnerable. I founded Compass CBT with the intention of providing a safe and non-judgmental space for the life-changing work of therapy. I approach each client with warmth, curiosity and respect. While some people know what they want from therapy, not everyone does, and thatâ€™s okay.

item.title: Treatment Approaches
item.description: I have extensive training and expertise in a variety of evidence-based therapeutic approaches. When creating a treatment plan, I will draw from the approaches that are most relevant to your circumstances and needs. My expertise includes, but is not limited to: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) CBT is a therapeutic approach that focuses on changing patterns of thinking and behavior associated with distress. CBT consists of: Cognitive therapy strategies focused on identifying and changing thought patterns that are causing and maintaining problematic emotions and behaviors.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: I am Dr. Regina Lazarovich, Ph.D., clinical psychologist and founder of Compass CBT. My mission is to help you find the life you want. I provide evidence-based cognitive behavior therapy with a compassionate individually-tailored approach. Together we can identify and change unhelpful patterns of thought and behavior that cloud your path. It is never too late to improve your quality of life and experience profound personal growth.
